eureca_building.systems

File with HVAC systems classes

Classes

ChillerAirtoWater(*args, **kwargs)

ChillerAirtoWater class

CondensingBoiler(*args, **kwargs)

Class CondensingBoiler This method considers a generic Condensing Boiler as the heating system of the entire building following UNI-TS 11300:2 - 2008

Class TraditionalBoiler This method considers a generic Traditional Boiler as the heating system of the entire building following UNI-TS 11300:2 - 2008

Class IdealLoad is for the ideal zone balance.
